name: Boss Fight Simulator (Sentient Sparrow)
description:
Controls

Unlock Cursor: Esc

Lock Cursor: Left-click in game window

Rotate Camera: Move Mouse

Attack: Left-click

Move: WASD

Roll: WASD + Shift

Jump: Spacebar

Assets used: GUI parts, stylized hand-painted dungeon, dungeon skeletons and medieval cartoon warriors.
